Verses: 1  Pinbu Avar Uvamaigalaai Avargalukku Sollaththodanginadhaavadhu: Oru Manushan Oru Thiraatchaththottaththai Undaakki, Adhai Sutrilum Veliyadaiththu, Rasaththottiyai Undupanni, Koburaththaiyum Katti, Thottakkaararukku Adhaik Kuththagaiyaaga Vittu, Purathdhesaththukkup Poyirundhaan.
2 thottakkaararidaththil Thiraatchaththottaththuk Kanigalil Than Paagaththai Vaangikkondu Varumpadi, Paruvakkaalaththile Avargalidaththil Oru Oozhiyakkaaranai Anuppinaan.
3 avargal Avanaippidiththu, Adiththu, Verumaiyaai Anuppivittaargal.
4 pinbu Veroru Oozhiyakkaaranai Avargalidaththil Anuppinaan; Avargal Avanmel Kallerindhu, Thalaiyile Kaayappaduththi, Avamaanappaduththi, Anuppivittaargal.
5 marupadiyum Veroruvanai Anuppinaan; Avanai Avargal Kolaiseydhaargal. Veru Anegaraiyum Anuppinaan; Avargalil Silarai Adiththu, Silaraik Kondrupottaargal.
6 avanukkuppiriyamaana Ore Kumaaran Irundhaan; En Kumaaranukku Anjuvaargalendru Solli, Avanaiyum Kadaisiyile Avargalidaththil Anuppinaan.
7 thottakkaararo: Ivan Sudhandharavaali, Ivanaik Kolaiseyvom Vaarungal; Appozhudhu Sudhandharam Nammudaiyadhaagum Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondu;
8 avanaip Pidiththuk Kolaiseydhu, Thiraatchaththottaththukkup Purambe Pottuvittaargal.
9 appadiyirukka, Thiraatchaththottaththukku Ejamaan Enna Seyvaan? Avan Vandhu Andhath Thottakkaararaich Sangariththu, Thiraatchaththottaththai Matravargalukku Oppukkoduppaan Allavaa?
10 veedu Kattugiravargal Aagaadhendru Thallina Kalle Moolaikkuth Thalaikkallaayitru;
11 adhu Karththaraale Aayitru, Adhu Nammudaiya Kangalukku Aachchariyamaayirukkiradhu Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Vaakkiyaththai Neengal Vaasikkavillaiyaa Endraar.
12 indha Uvamaiyai, Thangalaikkuriththu Sonnaarendru Avargal Arindhu, Avaraip Pidikka Vagaithedinaargal; Aanaalum Janaththukkup Bayandhu Avarai Vittup Poivittaargal.
13 avargal, Pechchile Avarai Agappaduththumpadikku, Pariseyarilum Erodhiyarilum Silarai Avaridaththil Anuppinaargal.

14 avargal Vandhu: Podhagare, Neer Saththiyamullavarendrum, Evanaikkuriththum Umakkuk Kavaiyillai (akkaraiyillai) Endrum Arindhirukkirom, Neer Mugadhaatchaniyam Illaadhavaraaith Dhevanudaiya Maarkkaththai Saththiyamaaip Podhikkireer, Iraayanukku Varikodukkiradhu Niyaayamo Allavo? Naam Kodukkalaamo, Kodukkakkootaadho? Endru Kettaargal.
15 avargaludaiya Maayaththai Avar Arindhu: Neengal Ennai En Sodhikkireergal? Naan Paarkkumpadikku Oru Panaththai Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal Endraar;
16 avargal Adhaik Konduvandhaargal. Appozhudhu Avar: Indha Suroobamum Melezhuththum Yaarudaiyadhu Endru Kettaar; Raayanudaiyadhu Endraargal.
17 adharku Yesu: Raayanudaiyadhai Raayanukkum, Dhevanudaiyadhai Dhevanukkum Seluththungal Endraar. Avargal Avaraikkuriththu Aachchariyappattaargal.
18 uyirththezhudhal Illai Endru Saadhikkira Sadhuseyar Avaridaththil Vandhu:

19 podhagare, Oruvanudaiya Sagodharan Sandhaanam Illaamal Irandhuponaal, Avanudaiya Sagodharan Avan Manaiviyai Vivaagampanni, Than Sagodharanukku Sandhaanam Undaakkavendumendru Mose Engalukku Ezhudhivaiththirukkiraare.
20 ippadiyirukka, Ezhu Per Sagodharar Irundhaargal; Mooththavan Oru Pennai Vivaagampanni, Sandhaanamillaamal Irandhuponaan.
21 irandaam Sagodharan Avalai Vivaagampanni, Avanum Sandhaanamillaamal Irandhuponaan. Moondraam Sagodharanum Appadiyeyaanaan.
22 ezhuperum Avalai Vivaagampanni, Sandhaanamillaamal Irandhuponaargal. Ellaarukkum Pinbu Andha Sthireeyum Irandhuponaal.
23 aagaiyaal, Uyirththezhudhalil, Avargal Ezhundhirukkumpodhu, Avargalil Evanukku Aval Manaiviyaayiruppaal? Ezhuperum Avalai Manaiviyaagakkondirundhaargale Endru Kettaargal.
24 yesu Avargalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neengal Vedhavaakkiyangalaiyum, Dhevanudaiya Vallamaiyaiyum Ariyaadhadhinaalallavaa Thappaana Ennankollugireergal?
25 mariththor Uyirode Ezhundhirukkumpodhu Kolvanaiyum Koduppanaiyum Illai; Avargal Paralogaththil Irukkira Dhevathoodharaippoliruppaargal;

26 mariththor Ezhundhiruppadhaippatri: Naan Aabiragaamin Dhevanum, Eesaakkin Dhevanum, Yaakkopin Dhevanumaayirukkiren Endru, Dhevan Mutchediyaik Kuriththu Solliya Idaththil, Moseyin Aagamaththil Avanukku Sonnadhai, Neengal Vaasikkavillaiyaa?
27 avar Mariththorukkuth Dhevanaayiraamal, Jeevanullorukkuth Dhevanaayirukkiraar; Aagaiyaal Neengal Migavum Thappaana Ennankollugireergal Endraar.
28 vedhapaaragaril Oruvan Avargal Tharkkampannugiradhaikkettu, Avargalukku Nandraai Uththaravu Sonnaarendru Arindhu, Avaridaththil Vandhu: Karpanaigalilellaam Piradhaana Karpanai Edhuvendru Kettaan.
29 yesu Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Karpanaigalilellaam Piradhaana Karpanai Edhuvendraal: Isravele Kel, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Oruvare Karththar.
30 un Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Un Muzhu Irudhayaththodum, Un Muzhu Aaththumaavodum, Un Muzhu Manadhodum, Un Muzhup Balaththodum Anbukooruvaayaaga Enbadhe Piradhaana Karpanai.
31 idharku Oppaayirukkira Irandaam Karpanai Ennavendraal: Unnidaththil Nee Anbukooruvadhupol Piranidaththilum Anbukooruvaayaaga Enbadhe; Ivaigalilum Periya Karpanai Verondrumillai Endraar.
32 adharku Vedhapaaragan: Saridhaan Podhagare, Neer Sonnadhu Saththiyam; Ore Dhevan Undu, Avaraiththavira Veroru Dhevan Illai.

33 muzhu Irudhayaththodum, Muzhu Manadhodum, Muzhu Aaththumaavodum, Muzhup Balaththodum Avaridaththil Anbu Koorugiradhum, Thannidaththil Anbukoorugiradhu Pol Piranidaththil Anbukoorugiradhume Sarvaangadhaganam Mudhaliya Baligalaippaarkkilum Mukkiyamaayirukkiradhu Endraan.
34 avan Vivegamaai Uththaravu Sonnadhai Yesu Kandu: Nee Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththukkuth Dhooramaanavanalla Endraar. Adhanpinbu Oruvanum Avaridaththil Yaadhoru Kelviyung Ketkath Thuniyavillai.
35 yesu Dhevaalayaththil Ubadhesampannugaiyil, Avar: Kiristhu Thaaveedhin Kumaaran Endru Vedhapaaragar Eppadi Sollugiraargal?

36 naan Ummudaiya Saththurukkalai Umakkup Paadhapadiyaakkip Podumvaraikkum Neer Ennudaiya Valadhu Paarisaththil Utkaarum Endru Karththar En Aandavarode Sonnaar Endru Thaaveedhu Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Solliyirukkiraane.
37 thaaveedhudhaane Avarai Aandavar Endru Solliyirukka, Avanukku Avar Kumaaranaayiruppadhu Eppadi Endraar. Anega Janangal Avarudaiya Ubadhesaththai Viruppaththode Kettaargal.
38 pinnum Avar Ubadhesampannugaiyil Avargalai Nokki: Neenda Angigalaith Thariththukkondu Thiriyavum, Sandhaiveligalil Vandhanangalai Adaiyavum,
39 jebaaalayangalil Mudhanmaiyaana Aasanangalil Utkaaravum, Virundhugalil Mudhanmaiyaana Idangalil Irukkavum Virumbi,
40 vidhavaigalin Veedugalaippatchiththu, Paarvaikku Neenda Jebampannugira Vedhapaaragaraikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Avargal Adhiga Aakkinaiyai Adaivaargal Endraar.
41 yesu Kaanikkaippettikku Edhiraaga Utkaarndhu, Janangal Kaanikkaippettiyil Panam Podugiradhaip Paarththukkondirundhaar; Aisuvariyavaangal Anegar Adhigamaaip Pottaargal.
42 ezhaiyaana Oru Vidhavaiyum Vandhu, Oru Thudukku Sariyaana Irandu Kaasaip Pottaal.
43 appozhudhu Avar Thammudaiya Seesharai Azhaiththu, Kaanikkaippettiyil Panampotta Matrellaaraippaarkkilum Indha Ezhai Vidhavai Adhigamaaip Pottaalendru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren;
44 avargalellaarum Thangal Paripooranaththilirundhu Eduththuppottaargal; Ivalo Than Varumaiyilirundhu Than Jeevanaththukku Undaayirundhadhellaam Pottuvittaal Endraar.
